data.name: Chainmonsters
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Chainmonsters is a massively multiplayer online RPG where you catch, battle, trade, explore, and combine different types of monsters and abilities to to create strong chain reactions!



Fuse the elements together to defeat your opponents. No game subscription required. Explore the vast lands of Ancora together with your friends on Steam, iOS and Android!

The world of Chainmonsters is filled with beautiful and handcrafted areas, lots of unique Chainmons, interesting characters and hidden secrets. Use fast travel to get from one point to the other quickly and invite your friends into your very own personal island, full of customization!

Key Features


Story-based campaign. Join the N-Corp agents and discover the mysterious disease that is affecting Chainmons across the land.

Massive Multiplayer allows you to join your friends on an epic journey and complete quests and dungeons together.


Combo/Chain battle system requires tactical play to defeat your opponents.

Cross-Platform Play across Steam, iOS and Android.

Catch over 135 unique Chainmons with diverse traits, types and abilities. Combine into multiple Squads for various occassions.

Dungeons and Raids challenge those that are eager to dive deep into the world and defeat special Raid bosses.

Dynamic day/night cycle and Weather system not only alters the visuals but influences the environment and dynamic battles anytime.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
